item.description: Building # Components # Plastic Nosepoke Body # nosepoke.stl nosepoke.step nosepoke_drawing.pdf PCBs and Electronics # PCB source files are on GitHub Rear PCB Perimeter PCB Qty Reference Description Value/MPN 1 D1 IR LED IR26-21C/L110/TR8 1 D2 Diffused White LED 23-11/T7D-CQ2R2QY/2A 1 J1 RJ45 Jack 0855135013 1 Q1 Phototransistor PT26-21C/TR8 1 R1 0603 Resistor 200立 1 R2 0603 Resistor 82立 1 R3 0603 Resistor 10K立 1 R4 0603 Resistor 20K立 View interactive Bill of Materials Hardware # QTY Description Part Number Supplier 1 1/8" Push-to-connect fitting 7880t137 McMaster-Carr 2 5mm long M2.

Using # pyControl # This nosepoke works with the pyControl behavior framework. Specifically, this means that the RJ45 pinout is compatible with pyControl. Using an ethernet cable, you can connect the nosepoke to an original breakout board or a D-series breakout board. The latest software release can be downloaded here. Additional pyControl hardware can be purchased from the Open Ephys Store. Example task # Note For the example to work, _nosepoke.
